response.original_title: Polyphony: Be You and Accept Me Too
response.overview: Understanding the world around us has never been more fun than with this multimedia potpourri of tolerance-themed short films. The collection includes more than 20 traditionally animated cartoons, ingenious computer graphics, puppetry, clay animation and more. Highlights include "Skye, the Rejected Little Troll," a hit at the 2008 Coachella Music & Arts Festival, Chris Miller's "Frankenstein Goes to Camp" and magic by the Amazing Zoltar.
response.title: Polyphony: Be You and Accept Me Too
